system.description:
You have learned to help your allies focus on the targets of your wrath. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Constitution score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

  • When you use Mark Foe, you can rage as part of the same bonus action.

  • If you score a critical hit on a creature that you have applied Mark Foe to, you may apply an additional Furious Critical option to the attack.
